articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN White House Producer
articles.title: Trump downplays past skepticism of Russian election meddling
articles.description: President Donald Trump downplayed on Sunday his past skepticism of Russia's involvement in US election meddling, saying he sides with American intelligence agencies over Vladimir Putin when it comes to assigning culpability for the hack.

articles.author: Daniella Diaz, CNN
articles.title: McCain slams Trump over siding with Putin on Russia meddling
articles.description: Sen. John McCain slammed President Donald Trump on Saturday for saying he believes Russian President Vladimir Putin over senior US intelligence officials when he says his country didn't interfere in the 2016 election.

articles.title: Smerconish: Here's who Trump doesn't believe - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Michael Smerconish says that if President Trump believes Russian President Vladimir Putin's denial of meddling in the 2016 US election, he is ignoring the conclusions of members of his own administration that Russia did interfere.

articles.author: Julian Zelizer, CNN Political Analyst
articles.title: Trump absolves Putin and shoots himself in the foot
articles.description: The President insisting that he believes Vladimir Putin's claim of not meddling in the US election overshadowed any positives from the Asia trip, Julian Zelizer says.
